title: How the financial crisis lit the weed industry on fire
text:
How the financial crisis lit the weed industry on fire 5:58am EDT - 02:06 
As the financial crisis roared 10 years ago, fired or weary bankers looking for work found smoking-hot opportunities as the legal marijuana business began to take off. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
